name: Omekamon
description: Omekamon has a white plastic, Lego -like body to which it has taped colored cardboard shaped to mimic Omnimon 's armor. It has crudely drawn on itself using colored marker to complete the effect, with the DigiCode お ( お , o ? ) where Omnimon's emblem would be. It carries a multicolored marker on its back, as well as a blue pen in place of a "Grey Sword".
